  "description": "Ruth and Roots is a renowned alternative health company focused on providing health remedies through herbs, nutrition and non-surgical procedures. Over the years, we have challenged the myth about herbs, enlightened the public and provided undisputable remedies to health challenges through herbs and nutrition.

We have a worldwide customer base extending into areas like Nigeria, Ghana, South Africa, Canada, USA, United Kingdom, China, the Philippines etc. We have an unwavering commitment to provide client-centred care to everyone who walks through our doors, and so are looking for staff who encompasses the attributes of a customer-focused professional.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A Customer Service Executive at Ruth and Roots acts as a liaison between the organisation and her clients, provides products/services information, answers questions; and resolves any emerging client-based problems with accuracy and efficiency.
	The best Customer Service Executives are genuinely excited to help customers.
	They are patient, empathetic, and passionately communicative.
	They love to talk and understand the value of good communication skills.
	Customer service representatives can put themselves in their customers&rsquo; shoes and advocate for them when necessary.
	The ideal candidate is someone who is social media savvy with a medical or healthcare background.


Key Responsibilities


	Act as the point of contact both physically and virtually between the company and her customers, guiding and recommending the best products and services for each client&#39;s needs.
	Provide correct information about the company&#39;s products and services to prospective and new clients.
	Ensure customers&#39; satisfaction with products and services by resolving complaints and enquiries.
	Follow up with customers via phone, social media or email to confirm purchase satisfaction.
	Upselling and cross selling of products and services to customers.
	Working with your team members and other departments to find the most effective solutions to problems.
	Escalation of customers&#39; concerns, complaints and feedback when necessary and appropriately.
	Follow communication procedures, guidelines and policies.
	Keep records of customers&#39; interactions, confirm customers&#39; payments and place customers&#39; orders.
	Ability to promote products effectively and engage customers in a friendly manner.
	Detail-oriented and capable of multitasking in a busy environment.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong negotiation and closing abilities.
	Physically able to assist customers with product inquiries.
	Customer-focused, with a positive attitude and a passion for helping people.
	Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to remain calm under pressure.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM systems.


Requirements


	Candidates must possess a degree in any relevant area.
	0 - 3 years of experience.
	The candidate must reside in Abuja


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application and CV to:&nbsp;hr@ruthandroots.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

        Ruth and Roots is a renowned alternative health company focused on providing health remedies through herbs, nutrition and non-surgical procedures. Over the years, we have challenged the myth about herbs, enlightened the public and provided undisputable remedies to health challenges through herbs and nutrition.

We have a worldwide customer base extending into areas like Nigeria, Ghana, South Africa, Canada, USA, United Kingdom, China, the Philippines etc. We have an unwavering commitment to provide client-centred care to everyone who walks through our doors, and so are looking for staff who encompasses the attributes of a customer-focused professional.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Care Executive
     

            
    



Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A Customer Service Executive at Ruth and Roots acts as a liaison between the organisation and her clients, provides products/services information, answers questions; and resolves any emerging client-based problems with accuracy and efficiency.
	The best Customer Service Executives are genuinely excited to help customers.
	They are patient, empathetic, and passionately communicative.
	They love to talk and understand the value of good communication skills.
	Customer service representatives can put themselves in their customers’ shoes and advocate for them when necessary.
	The ideal candidate is someone who is social media savvy with a medical or healthcare background.


Key Responsibilities


	Act as the point of contact both physically and virtually between the company and her customers, guiding and recommending the best products and services for each client's needs.
	Provide correct information about the company's products and services to prospective and new clients.
	Ensure customers' satisfaction with products and services by resolving complaints and enquiries.
	Follow up with customers via phone, social media or email to confirm purchase satisfaction.
	Upselling and cross selling of products and services to customers.
	Working with your team members and other departments to find the most effective solutions to problems.
	Escalation of customers' concerns, complaints and feedback when necessary and appropriately.
	Follow communication procedures, guidelines and policies.
	Keep records of customers' interactions, confirm customers' payments and place customers' orders.
	Ability to promote products effectively and engage customers in a friendly manner.
	Detail-oriented and capable of multitasking in a busy environment.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong negotiation and closing abilities.
	Physically able to assist customers with product inquiries.
	Customer-focused, with a positive attitude and a passion for helping people.
	Strong problem-solving abilities and the capacity to remain calm under pressure.
	Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM systems.


Requirements


	Candidates must possess a degree in any relevant area.
	0 - 3 years of experience.
	The candidate must reside in Abuja


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application and CV to: hr@ruthandroots.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "description": "Global Profilers is a recruitment &amp; HR consultancy company, providing a wide range of recruitment and selection services to local and international companies across Africa(and having our group and affilliate companies sited in South Asia and Europe). Our team of dedicated consultants offers businesses to get the right and best talent across wide range of sectors and professions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Our client is seeking a detail-oriented and highly skilled Internal Auditor to join their team in Ibadan.
	The successful candidate will play a key role in ensuring compliance, strengthening internal controls, and safeguarding the organization against risks and fraud.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in the design and implementation of internal audit processes.
	Conduct audits across company sites, departments, and operations.
	Prepare and present clear audit reports in line with standards.
	Review and test systems and procedures to ensure compliance.
	Identify risks, highlight audit findings, and recommend corrective measures.
	Participate in meetings to discuss audit outcomes and improvements.
	Contribute to the development of the annual internal audit plan.
	Apply data analytics to detect irregularities, fraud, or internal theft.


Skills &amp; Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	3 &ndash; 6 years of experience in internal/external audit.
	CIA certification is highly preferable.
	Prior experience with one of the Big 4 firms (Deloitte, EY, KPMG, PwC) is an added advantage.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	High level of integrity and attention to detail.
	Must be Nigerian.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly (Open to Negotiation).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;annetor@globalprofilers.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Our team of dedicated consultants offers businesses to get the right and best talent across wide range of sectors and professions.

Job Position: Internal Auditor

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Our client is seeking a detail-oriented and highly skilled Internal Auditor to join their team in Ibadan.
	The successful candidate will play a key role in ensuring compliance, strengthening internal controls, and safeguarding the organization against risks and fraud.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in the design and implementation of internal audit processes.
	Conduct audits across company sites, departments, and operations.
	Prepare and present clear audit reports in line with standards.
	Review and test systems and procedures to ensure compliance.
	Identify risks, highlight audit findings, and recommend corrective measures.
	Participate in meetings to discuss audit outcomes and improvements.
	Contribute to the development of the annual internal audit plan.
	Apply data analytics to detect irregularities, fraud, or internal theft.


Skills & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	3 – 6 years of experience in internal/external audit.
	CIA certification is highly preferable.
	Prior experience with one of the Big 4 firms (Deloitte, EY, KPMG, PwC) is an added advantage.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
	High level of integrity and attention to detail.
	Must be Nigerian.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly (Open to Negotiation).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: annetor@globalprofilers.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Our products include the flagship Zenfix peanut snack with sesame, yore cookies, handcrafted groundnuts, peanut powders, peanut paste, Rutf peanut and peanut cookies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Quality Control Officer

Job Location: Igando, Lagos
Industry: Manufacturing

About the Role


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Quality Assurance Officer to oversee and ensure the quality of products in an FMCG company.
	The ideal candidate will monitor production processes, conduct inspections, and enforce compliance with quality standards and specifications.


Key Responsibilities


	Monitor product quality throughout the production process.
	Inspect raw materials, in-process, and finished goods.
	Maintain quality documentation and reports.
	Ensure compliance with ISO standards and internal policies.
	Investigate and report non-conformities and recommend corrective actions.
	Train production staff on quality best practices.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an HND/BSC in Science, Engineering, or related field.
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in Quality Assurance, preferably in packaging or manufacturing.
	Familiarity with quality standards and testing tools.
	Excellent analytical and documentation skills.


Salary
Competitive.

Method of Application
